chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.
items.plainText: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.

items.text: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
items.plainText: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

items.text: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
items.plainText: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.

items.text: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
items.plainText: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.

items.text: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.
items.plainText: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.

items.text: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
items.plainText: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.

items.text: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.
items.plainText: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.

items.text: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
items.plainText: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.

items.text: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.
items.plainText: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.

items.text: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:
items.plainText: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:

items.text: I said in my haste, All men are liars.
items.plainText: I said in my haste, All men are liars.

items.text: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?
items.plainText: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?

items.text: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
items.plainText: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.

items.text: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.
items.plainText: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.

items.text: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.
items.plainText: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.

items.text: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.
items.plainText: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.

items.text: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.
items.plainText: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.

items.text: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people,
items.plainText: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people,

items.text: In the courts of the LORD's house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: In the courts of the LORD's house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
